title: AFK bug!
body: i was playing a rank at 4 am in the morning and the game like just start 2mins then suddenly victory ! then back to the modle! next day i got a afk warning

replies.body:
PFFFFFFFT WHAT? Do you have screens? This bug sounds amazing.

I suggest you try reinstalling League, if that's feasible. Most likely solution that will work. If you have more details, then I can probably help you more.

Best of luck.
pls help me !  december 29 i was playing riven!
